para.text: A notarial officer may perform a notarial act authorized by this chapter or by law of the District other than this chapter.
A notarial officer shall not perform a notarial act if:
The record is incomplete or blank;
The notarial officer or the officer's spouse is a party to the record;
The notarial officer or the officer's spouse has a direct beneficial interest in the record; or
The notarial officer does not read or understand the language in which the certificate of notarial act is written.
A notarial act performed in violation of this section is voidable.
A notarial officer may certify that a tangible copy of an electronic record is an accurate copy of the electronic record.
